meanings.definition: A type of dog bred for hunting.
meanings.sent1: The hounds quickly sniffed out the trail.
meanings.sent2: The pack of hounds chased after the fox.
meanings.sent3: The hounds wagged their tails excitedly as they followed the scent.
meanings.sent4: The hounds' howls echoed through the forest, signaling their pursuit.
meanings.sent5: The hounds' keen sense of smell made them excellent hunters.

meanings.sent1: The paparazzi hounds the celebrities for photos.
meanings.sent2: The creditors hounded him for payment day and night.
meanings.sent3: The persistent salesman hounds customers to buy his products.
meanings.sent4: The memories of his past mistakes hounded him constantly.
meanings.sent5: The detective hounds the suspect until he confesses.

meanings.definition: A person who eagerly pursues something.
meanings.sent1: She is a real hounds when it comes to finding bargains.
meanings.sent2: The treasure hunter was a hounds for ancient artifacts.
meanings.sent3: The hounds for knowledge led him to read every book in the library.
meanings.sent4: Her hounds for adventure took her to the far corners of the world.
meanings.sent5: The hounds for success drove him to work hard every day.
